contents:
You'll need enough "Onions" to start a new thread. To obtain Onions, you may either upvote other posts or get upvotes from others.
Pincong is a Chinese-language forum. Although the use of English is not restricted here, it is not encouraged, either. If you don't speak Chinese, it might be a good idea to use a translator and post bilingually.
Welcome and have fun.
